[#scald-erosion-degree_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-plot-soil-description-protocol-shapes:scald-erosion-degree:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils scald erosion degrees codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils scald erosion degrees codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/a8f8fcbe-12d1-5c74-bbb3-b31fb551b96a[`Minor scalding (<5%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/58f901ed-cd32-5009-947f-50ae3fb94f9a[`Moderate scalding (5-50%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/f1fe9197-9ffe-574c-8246-7dad59ae5a5a[`No scalding`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/eb78ee88-aea4-5387-b679-08207a2d879e[`Severe scalding (>50%)`] 


|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
